thread.title: Akash
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Akash

author: Akash
title: Akash
text:
Unfortunately I had to return the item but at no fault of Country Attire - more mine because I did not realise the colour would not suit.
All in all, the order process was mainly problem-free - I say mainly because initially there was an issue with the site in that when I added the item to my basket, it went through to payment and then failed. When I went back to re-order, the item is out of stock. I then saw the same on their eBay page in stock...so I tried via eBay, went to checkout, item out of stock. Went back to the site, suddenly it's back in-stock. After playing this game of tennis, I finally managed to order and delivery was next day.
Country Attire took the item back and in-between delivery and returns, I had support contact me checking up on the issues I had the previous night.
Can't complain, the whole returns process was problem free and quick. Will purchase to keep next time from CA!
